channel.title: massive-entertainment
channel.description:
Here you will find mixes I (DJ Andy Hung) made in the past and mixes I will do in the future. Every now and then massive entertainment features friends of mine who are also DJing.
Different genres like vocal house, tech house, progressive house, trance & more will be featured.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Your electronic music source !
channel.itunes:author: Andy Hung
channel.itunes:summary:
Here you will find mixes I (DJ Andy Hung) made in the past and mixes I will do in the future. Every now and then massive entertainment features friends of mine who are also DJing.
Different genres like vocal house, tech house, progressive house, trance & more will be featured.

item.title: massive-entertainment.org_DJ Andy Hung_progressive house 6
item.description: Welcome back to Massive Entertainment. It took me quite a while to load up a new episode. Very many things changed in my life so this is the "there changed a lot" episode :-) It´s progressive house again, the next episode which will hopefully be released before x-mas will be funky house again. so enjoy and give us some feedback or follow us on facebook. LOVE ! Here comes the tracklist...yep, it´s a long mix :-) Magenta Sunset (original mix) - Michael Cassette Kilimanjaro ( original mix) - Michael Cassette Back to solaris (original mix) - George F. Zimmer We love machine ( Jaytech Remix) - Way Out West Needles and Pins (original mix) - Passenger 10 Saltwater (Christopher S % Mike C) - Mr. Pink Premiumline(original mix) - EDX The Sin (original mix) - Dinka All night long (original mix) - George F. Zimmer Flyby ( original mix) - Paul Keeley Waterfall ( original mix) - Paul Thomas Clear Senses (original mix) - Liluca Rockin´High feat. Mitch Crown - Fedde Le Grand Oyster (Michael Woods RMX) - Moguai In the jungle (original mix) - Jaytech Bitchcrusher (original mix) - Sleek Calimba ( original mix) - Daniel Portman One of these days (original mix) - Stanley Ross Love bite ( pure two remix) - Jay P. , Seb Fontaine Wellness Park ( helvetic nerds rmx) - Daniel Portman T o the six ( martin roth rmx) - Boom Jinx

item.title: massive-entertainment.org_Tapeconvert_20071997_DJ Andy Hung & DJ Stefano Marangos pingpong Live@TOS Club
item.description: Dear Audience, faster than ever we´re already back to provide you with some stunning DJ Mixes from back in the dayz when clublife was still more crazy than today. This mix was recorded @ the legendary TOS Club in Nuremberg, Germany Ping Pong By DJ Andy Hung and DJ Stefano Marangos Enjoy ! Sorry, no Tracklist!
item.dc:creator: Andy Hung
item.itunes:summary:
Dear Audience, faster than ever we´re already back to provide you with some stunning DJ Mixes from back in the dayz when clublife was still more crazy than today.
This mix was recorded @ the legendary TOS Club in Nuremberg, Germany
Ping Pong By DJ Andy Hung and DJ Stefano Marangos
Enjoy ! Sorry, no Tracklist!

item.title: massive-entertainment.org_DJ Andy Hung_funkyhouse4
item.description: Welcome back to Massive entertainment! We wish all of our listeners a happy new Year! After a long time we feature some funky house again! We hope you like it ! Please feel free to send a comment! Here comes the tracklist: Green Leaf (Club Mix) - Dinka My Destiny ( Seamus Haji Mix) - Seamus Haji, Dinoi Psaras Only You (003 Club mix) - Aston Martinez, Mario Held Lost in the Music feat. Maiya (Born to funkoldskool delight mix) - Justin Michael, Dave Mayer Sweetest Taboo (Stonebridge Future Retro WMC Re-Club) - Stephanie B Won´t do it again (Sunrise) feat. Laura Vane (Seamus & Haji & Dave Spoon vocal edit) - Dave Spoon Seize the night (Original Mix) - Rino Cabrera The right way (Marc Leaf Remix) - Wawa, Herd, Amanda Wilson Nothing but Love (Extended Vocal Mix) - Axwell, Errol Reid David (Christian Luke Remix) - GusGus Blackwater (Original Mix) - Carl Kennedy, Tommy Trash, Rosie Henshaw Just a friend feat. Awa (Vocal Mix) - Seamus Haji, Romain Curtis Every little thing (Original Mix) - Julie Thompson, Eddie Jenkins, Dave Budgen ENJOY !!!

item.itunes:summary:

item.title: massive-entertainment.org_DJ Andy Hung_progressivehouse5_finnmix_31082010
item.description: Welcome back 2 Massive-Entertainment! It´s been a while since we published our last mix, but I have been busy moving and getting a child (my wife did :-)), so please enjoy this mix which I dedicated to my son, who was born a couple of weeks ago. We used to publish mixes biweekly, but now since situations are changing, I am only able to publish mixes every once in a while...I try to make´em even better though so you have longer time to enjoy! This one is packed with brandnew tracks...I hope you enjoy it ! Leave us some comments...We love feedback ! Special beloved Greetings to the Ayahuasca Crew ! ;-) Here comes the tracklist: the careful void (original mix) - paul keeley solen (satoshi fumi ultra marine remix) - the signal london feat. 1985 (original mix) - marcus schossow hola ( original mix) - alex monakhov passenger 10 ( chris reece remix) - passenger 10 zero altitude ( original mix) - dinka gold rush ( original mix) - jamie matrix playmaker (original mix) - beltek dark is the night for all (original mix) - daniel portman soma (original mix) - george f. zimmer niton (original mix) - pryda shear force ( daniel portman & jerome isma-ae remix) - kaempfer & dietze strobe (club edit) - deadmau5 shine (andrew bennett & rico soarez rmx) - hydroform sunday (original mix) - oliver smith alien & butterfly (original mix) - sergey tkachev sunrise (original mix) - boom jinx, oliver smith
item.dc:creator: Andy Hung

It´s been a while since we published our last mix, but I have been busy moving and getting a child (my wife did :-)), so please enjoy this mix which I dedicated to my son, who was born a couple of weeks ago.
We used to publish mixes biweekly, but now since situations are changing, I am only able to publish mixes every once in a while...I try to make´em even better though so you have longer time to enjoy!

item.title: massive-entertainment.podomatic.com_DJ Andy Hung_progressive house 4
item.description: Welcome back folks, here we come with a brandnew episode of progressive house. Hope you enjoy it. If you wish other genres let us know what and we look what what we van do for you. Here comes the tracklist: Tivoli (original mix) - Steve Angello Exit (original mix) - Komytea Elder (original mix) - Daniel Portman Civilisation (original mix) - Dinka Professional Killers (Jerome Isma- Ae & Daniel Portman remix) - Komytea Fine times (original mix) - FM Radio Gods Coco & Nuts (original mix) - True Lies Gobal Illumination (Martin Roth OMFG! Remix) - Liquid Soul .....(best track ever!) Delta (original mix) - Jaytech Hillside (original mix) - Chris Cowie Triclops (club version) - Union Jack Sabath (original mix) - Anton Chernikov Virtual Suicide (original mix) - Daniel Portman This mix is just for promotional use// all tracks have been purchased @ beatport.com For DJ booking please write an email. Please leave your comment to let us know where we can improve! thanks !

item.title: massive-entertainment.podomatic.com_DJ Andy Hung_techhouse1
item.description: Welcome back to Massive entertainment! This time we didn´t have you waiting for a long time. Enjoy our first Techhouse Mix with all new tracks! Here comes the tracklist: Lamur (original mix) - Guy J Caribbean (original mix) - Luca Bacchetti True to Nature (shik stylko remix) - Astronivo Charlotte (mic newman remix) - Booka Shade World of Love (club mix) - John Dahlback House of God (martin landsky remix) - D.H.S. item.title: DJ Chris Reidel_Tapeconvert 17081994_Techno_Trance_classics_massive-entertainment.podomatic.com.a
item.description: Hi Listeners, This podcast is the SIDE A of the converted tape from DJ Chris Reidel from 17th of August 1994....pretty much 15 years old.... it´s amazing how fast time goes by... Only the best classic hits on there ! SIDE B is the podcast below ! Enjoy Listening!
item.dc:creator: Andy Hung
item.itunes:summary:
Hi Listeners,
This podcast is the SIDE A of the converted tape from DJ Chris Reidel from 17th of August 1994....pretty much 15 years old.... it´s amazing how fast time goes by...
Only the best classic hits on there !
SIDE B is the podcast below !
Enjoy Listening!

item.title: DJ Chris Reidel_Tapeconvert 17081994_Techno_Trance_classics_massive-entertainment.podomatic.com.
item.description: Welcome back to Massive Entertainment ! The last few Episodes featured DJ Andy Hung and now we also want to feature some good old Techno and Trance Classics. My Friend David found a very old Tape from the 17th of August 1994 stuffed with the best Tracks from back in the days. He also designed the Cover for our new "subcast" called "The forgotten Tapes" We hope you enjoy it as much we do ! If you are in your 30´s and were a clubber or raver from the very beginning on you will know all the songs covered in this tape. This Tape was mixed by DJ Chris Reidel who comes from Nürnberg, Germany. This is the B-Side Every now and then we will feature some old tapes which we are digitalizing just 4 ur enjoyment! Please let us know if you like it. If you have an old Tape which you think is worth publishing sent us an email and we´ll get back to you as soon as possible ! If you are waiting eagerly for a new Mix from DJ Andy Hung, there will be more in the future. Sorry, no Tracklist- Thanks for listening !
item.dc:creator: Andy Hung
item.itunes:summary:
Welcome back to Massive Entertainment !
The last few Episodes featured DJ Andy Hung and now we also want to feature some good old Techno and Trance Classics. My Friend David found a very old Tape from the 17th of August 1994 stuffed with the best Tracks from back in the days. He also designed the Cover for our new "subcast" called
"The forgotten Tapes"
We hope you enjoy it as much we do !
If you are in your 30´s and were a clubber or raver from the very beginning on you will know all the songs covered in this tape.
This Tape was mixed by DJ Chris Reidel who comes from Nürnberg, Germany. This is the B-Side
Every now and then we will feature some old tapes which we are digitalizing just 4 ur enjoyment!
Please let us know if you like it. If you have an old Tape which you think is worth publishing sent us an email and we´ll get back to you as soon as possible !
If you are waiting eagerly for a new Mix from DJ Andy Hung, there will be more in the future.
Sorry, no Tracklist- Thanks for listening !

item.title: DJ Andy Hung_electrohouse 1_11072009_massive-entertainment.podomatic.com
item.description: Welcome back to massive entertainment ! Today´s episode is filled with loads of forward going electrohouse! Please leave a comment to give us the feeling if you appreciate this kind of music. Thanks & enjoy ! Here comes the tracklist: Sun is shining (Funkerman Remix) - Re-united Organ of Love (want Love)(Original Mix) - Jerry Ropero, Caesar´s scissors Pa Po Pon (Chris Kaeser Mix) - Mowgli Speaker (Original Mix) - KC Flightt, ATFC, Seamus Haji No No No feat, Roxanne Wild (D.O.N.S. & DBN Remix) - Milk & Sugar Slip (Original Mix) - Deadmau5 Leave the World behind (Original Mix) - Steve Angello, Axwell, Laidback Luke Cocktail Queen (Original Mix) - Melleefresh, Deadmau5 Pills & Champagne (Paul Anthony & ZXX Remix) - Discount Rhinos Our Darkness (Original Mix) - David Penn, Rober Gaez I Won´t feat. Charlie Brown (Hoxton Whores Remix) - Groovepusher Hey Baby (Original Mix) - Melleefresh, Deadmau5 Girls speak louder (Donique Remix) - Costello

item.title: Techno_Liverecording/tapeconvert_Club Boot Nuremberg_24111993_DJ Tanith
item.description: Hi y´all welcome back to Massive E ! This Episode features a well known DJ from Berlin, Germany: DJ Tanith. This Mix was recorded on the 24th november 1993 in Club Boot in Nuremberg, Germany. Thanks to Dango Bosch who provided the mix and thanks to Tanith, who allowed us to publish it. Sorry, no tracklist, but I heard a couple of hits from back in the days like "The weeping waste" from Renegade Legion on this Mix. ENJOY!
item.dc:creator: Andy Hung
item.itunes:summary:
Hi y´all welcome back to Massive E !
This Episode features a well known DJ from Berlin, Germany:
DJ Tanith.
This Mix was recorded on the 24th november 1993 in Club Boot in Nuremberg, Germany. Thanks to Dango Bosch who provided the mix and thanks to Tanith, who allowed us to publish it. Sorry, no tracklist, but I heard a couple of hits from back in the days like "The weeping waste" from Renegade Legion on this Mix.
ENJOY!

item.title: Trance/Techno_Liverecording_Club Downstairs Bamberg_21031994_VCOli
item.description: Hi y´all welcome back ! This time we have another very special mix from back in the days. There used to exist a club called ´downstairs´ which was located in Bamberg, Germany. As the BOOT in Nuremberg this club was also very famous for its afterhours. The former resident DJ VC Oli is featured in this podcast. Sorry, no Tracklist. Thanks to David Hartfiel who converted this tape and gave it to us ! Enjoy this mix and go back in time !
item.dc:creator: Andy Hung
item.itunes:summary:
Hi y´all welcome back !
This time we have another very special mix from back in the days. There used to exist a club called ´downstairs´ which was located in Bamberg, Germany. As the BOOT in Nuremberg this club was also very famous for its afterhours. The former resident DJ VC Oli is featured in this podcast.
Sorry, no Tracklist.
Thanks to David Hartfiel who converted this tape and gave it to us !
Enjoy this mix and go back in time !

item.title: Funkyhouse_2_andyhung
item.description: Dear Audience, welcome back! I´m a bit busy at the moment, so I am currently not able to provide brandnew mixes. But since I don´t want you guys to wait so long, I decided to publish an new mix from the beginning of 2008. Also great tracks, a very good quality, since it was a harddisc recording. Sorry, no tracklist available. This mix is a journey from funky house to tech house! Hope you love it! Please write some comments and give us infos which kind of genre you prefer. Which mixes did you like best so far ? In the future we will have more new mixes, we promise ! So enjoy the ride....LOVE, Andy
item.dc:creator: Andy Hung
item.itunes:summary:
Dear Audience, welcome back! I´m a bit busy at the moment, so I am currently not able to provide brandnew mixes. But since I don´t want you guys to wait so long, I decided to publish an new mix from the beginning of 2008. Also great tracks, a very good quality, since it was a harddisc recording. Sorry, no tracklist available. This mix is a journey from funky house to tech house! Hope you love it!
Please write some comments and give us infos which kind of genre you prefer. Which mixes did you like best so far ? In the future we will have more new mixes, we promise !
So enjoy the ride....LOVE, Andy

item.title: Trance_1_andyhung
item.description: Welcome back to massive entertainment ! This episode is our NEW LOGO RELEASE EPISODE! Working hard to cover all interesting genres we now present a wonderful -teethshaking :-)) - trancemix that you hopefully will enjoy ! Please leave a comment, we appreciate any notice ! Here comes the Tracklist: - (Feelme) through the radio (Inpetto mix) - DJ Shog - Different Feeling (original mix) - Simon Patterson - Sound of Sunday (original mix) - Joonas Hahmo - White - Smith & Pledger - Horizon (Hydroid MIx) - Uriel - Mirage (EDX´s Sunshine Remix) - Passenger 10 - Sincere ( Lange MIx) - Firewall - Sunshine - Alex M.O.R.P.H - Resound (original version) - Thomas Bronzwaer - One more night (original version) - Syan Tyas Presents Logistics - Smack - Simon Patterson - Strip search (original mix) - Simon Patterson - Riff (original mix) - Sander van Doorn
